articles.description: It has been suggested that intermittent fasting may help in cell repair (which may combat ageing) and produce favourable effects on metabolic parameters like cholesterol and blood sugar.
articles.content: The quest for perfect health and a long life has always driven humankind to try different kinds of food and diets. Despite all the advances in science, the search for an ideal diet remains elusive. F… [+5410 chars]
